channel.title: Small problem that i need help with
channel.description: can someone help me fix my npcdrops im having a hard time with it i have team viewer

item.title: Small problem that i need help with
item.dc:creator: @B0SS B0SS
item.description:
@B0SS wrote:

[quote=“imstrength, post:14, topic:468105”]Alright here we go again

use the NPCDrops.TSM file here is an example of the first name you have in there

#sergeant strongstack
6261:150 995:20000 808:129 886:127 391:2 207:2 3051:2 213:2
11710:1 11712:1 11714:1 11724:1 11726:1 11728:1 989:1

NPC NAME
NPC ID
CHANCE AT RARE DROP 1 FOR EVERy 150 KILLS IN THIS EXAMPLE
ITEM ID
ITEM AMOUNT

[size=18pt]THE SECOND LINE IS ALL THE RARE DROPS “ONE OUT OF 150 IN THIS EXAMPLE”[/size]

Hope this helped man ;)[/quote]
thats the problem i get?

Read full topic

item.title: Small problem that i need help with
item.dc:creator: @B0SS B0SS
item.description:
@B0SS wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:4, topic:468105”]Look at the first Screen Capture to the left.

1 995 10000 100

1 = N.P.C. I.D.

995 = Item I.D.

10,000 = Amount of Item

100 = Chance of receiving Item as a Drop

P.S. Wordwrap + at least use Notepad++[/quote]i did that my self and it doesnt work… a lot of my friends dont even know how to do it and ur hella smart… and everytime i kill the npc id i just get charms i no get coins

Read full topic
item.source: Small problem that i need help with

item.title: Small problem that i need help with
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Look at the first Screen Capture to the left.

1 995 10000 100

1 = N.P.C. I.D.

995 = Item I.D.

10,000 = Amount of Item

100 = Chance of receiving Item as a Drop

P.S. Wordwrap + at least use Notepad++

Read full topic
